titles.title: Congratulating the Public Broadcasting Service as it celebrates the 15th anniversary season of the nationally televised broadcast program, Public Broadcasting Service's To The Contrary, with Bonnie Erbe.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Women in the mass media industry

bill.summary: 3/16/2006--Introduced. Congratulates "To the Contrary" and Bonnie Erbe for their 15-season run on the Public Broadcasting Service and for consistently giving voice to significant social issues affecting women, children, families, and communities of color.
